data.name: ProtoCorgi Demo
data.detailed_description:
This is the ProtoCorgi Demo!.
A very long unique mixed level with content and difficulty from first stage to last one.
We are open and encourage feedback from community.
If you enjoyed the demo don't forget to add ProtoCorgi to your wishlist and follow our devlog and social networks for more information and updates about our projects.

More info about the project in the main steam page of the project:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1039280/ProtoCorgi

data.short_description: This is the ProtoCorgi Demo!.A very long unique mixed level with content and difficulty from first stage to last one.We are open and encourage feedback from community.If you enjoyed the demo don't forget to add ProtoCorgi to your wishlist and follow our devlog and social networks for more information and updates about our projects.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Wiindows 7,8,10
  • Processor: 2+ GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader model 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo sound
  • Additional Notes: Some laptops will default to running ProtoCorgi off of their integrated GPU. We strongly recommend that you run ProtoCorgi on your dedicated GPU.
